headline: Northrop Grumman: $1.5 Trillion Defense Budget Boosts F/A-XX Win (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) is well positioned to win the Navy's F/A-XX contract. Read what this deal may deliver for investors in this defense giant.

headline: Is RTX Well-Placed to Benefit From Higher Defense Spending?
summary: RTX is likely to gain from a proposed jump in U.S. defense spending, which may improve long-term funding visibility for major defense contractors.

headline: Lockheed Martin Stock Rises 13.7% in a Month: Here's How to Play
summary: LMT's shares jumped 13.7% in a month as a PAC-3 MSE deal, record 191 F-35 deliveries, an increase in the US defense budget and new space awards lift revenue visibility.

headline: JetZero Raises $175 Million in Series B Financing to Transform Aircraft Innovation
summary: JetZero, the U.S.-based start-up airplane maker designing the world's first commercial all-wing airplane, announces it has raised approximately $175 million in its Series B financing, led by B Capital, a global multi-stage investment firm. United Airlines Ventures, Northrop Grumman, 3M Ventures and RTX Ventures, the corporate venture capital arm of RTX, among others, also participated in the round. headline: Hegseth Slams Risk-Averse Defense Culture in Starbase Visit
summary: Hegseth announced several plans meant to speed innovation and slammed what he called “woke” artificial intelligence.  The administration has threatened to cut out some big companies if they don’t speed up production and innovation.
